metadata.name: Universal Language Codex
metadata.description: Complete translation system for 6 programming languages + 6 Sacred Tongues
metadata.creator: App Productizer Universal Bridge System

function_spell.description: A reusable block of code or magical incantation
function_spell.usage: Encapsulates logic for reuse and organization

variable_memory.description: Storage of data or magical energy
variable_memory.usage: Stores values for later use in computation

loop_ritual.description: Repetitive execution of code or ritual
loop_ritual.usage: Iterates over collections or repeats operations

condition_choice.usage: Controls program flow based on conditions

error_curse.description: Handling of errors or magical mishaps

class_entity.description: Template for creating objects or entities
class_entity.usage: Defines structure and behavior of objects

array_collection.description: Collection of multiple items or entities
array_collection.usage: Stores multiple values in ordered structure

print_manifest.usage: Displays information to user or console

return_complete.description: Return a result or complete a process
return_complete.usage: Returns value from function to caller
